trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button in the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>-hendelse når en Insert-knapp i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (An Insert button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: (En Insert-knappen er en knapp der `CommandName` er satt til "Insert".) Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can validate or HTML-encode the values of a record before it is inserted it in the data source.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du kan validere eller HTML-kode verdiene i en post før det inn den i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: A ListViewInsertEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewInsertEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden.

trans-unit.source: This object enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument that is sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet, kan du bestemme verdien for en valgfri Kommandoargumentet som sendes til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is being inserted by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objektet som settes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese eller endre feltverdiene for den nye posten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte innsettingen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewInsertEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewInsertEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A>| Verdien for den `item` parameteren. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewInsertEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data item that is being inserted into the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dataelementet som settes inn i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref> object that represents the data item to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"> </xref> objektet som representerer dataelementet som skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to access the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control for the data that is being inserted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk elementegenskapen tilgang til elementet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen for dataene som skal settes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can access values from controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template that are not data-bound by using the Item property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel tilgang til verdier kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>mal som ikke er bundet til data ved hjelp av elementegenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do so, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object that is referenced by the Item property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>objektet som refereres til av elementegenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data item to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Dataelement som skal settes inn.

trans-unit.source: Gets the values for the record to insert.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdiene for oppføringen å sette inn.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the fields for the record to insert.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen verdier til å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene for oppføringen å sette inn.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can validate or HTML-encode the values of the record before it is inserted in the data source.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du kan validere eller HTML-kode verdiene i oppføringen før den er satt inn i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdiene en <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer feltene i oppføringen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til feltnavnene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the field values, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til feltverdiene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei, kan du bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltet verdier direkte.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage of using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordelen ved bruk av indeksering er at den returnerer feltverdier direkte.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontroller som avhenger av feltrekkefølgen (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) kan bare tilgang til feltverdier ved indeks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The values for the record to insert.
trans-unit.target: Verdier for oppføringen å sette inn.
